short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Autofill any form (job applications, registrations, booking,...) smartly and conveniently!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Help you save a lot of time and effort in filling out forms, our extension offers these main 
features:

- Autofill basic information: Autofill personal details, educational background, work history, and other information (currently supports English only).

- Custom autofill: Autofill any information by manually writing your own rules (conditions); it can even override the above basic information (supports all languages).

- Capture/Auto-capture: Allow you to manually or automatically capture information from any form; the captured information is used to autofill when needed.

- Auto-trigger: Automatically run autofill without the need to click the "Fill The Form" button.


KEYBOARD SHORTCUT
- non-MacOS (Windows, Linux,...):
Alt + 1: Capture info
Alt + 2: Autofill info
- MacOS:
control + 1: Capture info
control + 2: Autofill info


PRIVACY & SECURITY
- All of the data is stored on your local hard disk, JobFill does not track any of your browsing activities and does not transfer any of your data over the internet. 
- Auto-capture doesn't capture passwords but it might capture other sensitive info and store them in Chrome storage local (your local hard disk), currently, this info is not encrypted yet, so be aware when using this feature. (you can disable auto-capture when working with sensitive data or click on the clear button to clear the captured info) - the data encryption feature is still under development.


PERMISSIONS
- host_permissions (*://*/*): JobFill requires this permission to detect forms and auto-fill them. The permission will display a warning message: "Read and change all your data on the websites you visit".
- unlimitedStorage: This permission allows JobFill to store data on your hard disk.
- cookie: JobFill uses this permission to access jobfill.ai cookies for authentication and data encryption.


CONTACT & FEEDBACK
Please send to jobfill.ext@gmail.com
